TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LogRecordEnumeratorType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the manner in which records should be read from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is provided to the <xref:System.IO.Log.IRecordSequence.ReadLogRecords%2A> method to control the order in which records should be read. Each value corresponds to one of the metadata sequence numbers stored in a log record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Log.LogRecordEnumeratorType Next = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Records should be read in the order in which they were appended to the sequence.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Log.LogRecordEnumeratorType Previous = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Records should be read in the order specified by the Previous sequence number of the log record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Log.LogRecordEnumeratorType User = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Records should be read in the order specified by the User sequence number of the log record.
